name: ganymede
description: Ganymede is an open-source tool for archiving Twitch VODs and clips with metadata and transcoding. It works with Cloudflare R2 or local storage and provides a web UI for browsing archived content.

features.title: Chat Preservation
features.description: Capture and store chat logs alongside video content for complete stream archives

features.title: Metadata Storage
features.description: Save stream metadata including titles, descriptions, timestamps, and viewer counts

features.title: Video Transcoding
features.description: Transcode archived content to optimize storage space and playback compatibility

features.title: Cloud Storage
features.description: Integrate with Cloudflare R2 or local storage for flexible archive management

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Browse and search archived streams through a dedicated web UI with filtering options

features.title: Automated Downloads
features.description: Schedule automatic archiving of favorite channels and streamers

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Maintain your own Twitch content archive independent of platform retention policies
